new contextualized embedding model.from sentence: In this paper , we describe a new contextualized embedding model for words and entities for NED .

proposed model.from sentence: Following , the proposed model is based on the bidirectional transformer encoder .

sequence of words and entities.from sentence: It takes a sequence of words and entities in the input text , and produces a contextualized embedding for each word and entity .

masked entity prediction.from sentence: Inspired by MLM , we propose masked entity prediction , a new task that aims to train the embedding model by predicting randomly masked entities based on words and non-masked entities in the input text .

model.from sentence: We trained the model using texts and their entity annotations retrieved from Wikipedia .
